summary.p: Sends him a pig and invites him for a visit, preferably next Sunday; he will slaughter and expects only a few guests. The wine will be picked up; regarding Rümbeli, he leaves it up to him. Urges him to come and also bring the mother and Beat [Gering] along. Requests the purchase of spices.

div.p: Dear brother, I am sending you the sow here - God willing, it would be large, but it is the best - and I kindly ask you (I leave the task of asking with you) to come out this Sunday, as I also intend to slaughter on Saturday; the sows are too costly for me.

Or, if it is not possible, then come on Monday evening to Hedingen; on the way, you will find yourself at Otthmar's house, and then on Tuesday with me. But I would prefer to have you on Sunday. Then Vogt, Frau Winckelman, Heini Joß will be with me and otherwise no one but you and your people; tell them that.
Furthermore, Michel Widmer will fetch the wine this week or on Monday, as you see fit. Handle Rümbeli as you wish. Farewell, love the one who loves you.
I kindly ask you to come on either day, and tell the mother, Beat as well; I will then be more willing to do you a favor.
Tell the mother to buy 1 lot of cinnamon and cloves.
